text: Gary V. Staples (January 16, 1940 â€“ January 2, 2021) was an American Republican politician. In 2004 he was elected as a member of the Mississippi House of Representatives. Before, he was a member from 1988 to 1992. He was born in Laurel, Mississippi. Staples died on 2 January 2021 in Laurel from cancer, aged 80. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Mississippi Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Mississippi Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Gary Staples
